entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
